title: Attack on Titan - 進撃の巨人 - Shingeki no Kyojin
description: Eren Yeager, who vows to exterminate giant, man-eating Titans after they destroy his home, forcing humanity to live within massive walls for survival. The story starts as a fight for survival but evolves into a complex tale of war, lost history, the true nature of Titans, and a world where "enemies" and "heroes" shift, exploring themes of freedom, hatred, and perspective as Eren and friends uncover shocking truths about their world and the cycle of conflict.
author: Hajime Isayama

001.title: To You, 2,000 Years from Now - 二千年後の君へ - Ni Sen Nen Go no Kimi e

002.title: That Day - その日 - Sono Hi

003.title: Night of the Disbanding Ceremony - 解散式の夜 - Kaisanshiki no Yoru

005.title: A Dull Glow in the Midst of Despair - 絶望の中で鈍く光る - Zetsubō no Naka de Nibuku Hikaru

006.title: The World that the Girl Saw - 少女が見た世界 - Shōjo ga Mita Sekai
